thread.section_title: Blinds 2go Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blinds 2go | www.blinds-2go.co.uk | 37 of 2268
thread.title: Jo M

author: Jo M
title: Jo M
text:
I was a bit nervous about ordering online for made to order blinds but I needn't have been!
Firstly the fabric samples I ordered arrived the following day so I was able to see the colour and quality. The ordering process was easy and very clear about where to measure. The communication about the progress of the order was great and I had my blinds well within the stated time.
They are great quality and a perfect fit. I'm very happy with my purchase and would definitely use this company again. Highly recommended.
